name: Barbershop Sim 3D
description:
Become the best barber in the city! Make your barbershop famous one haircut at the time.

Every customer will ask for a specific haircut. The skillfull barber that you are won't have any problem pleasing their needs. Give them a trending look with your unique hairdressing skills.

For the task you have different tools that will help you along the way. Cut, shave, trim, dye and more!

Features:
- Casual and strategic gameplay for every player
- Stunning beard trimming and trending cut hair styles for boys and girls
- Realistic graphics
- Dozens of hairstyles and razor services

What are you waiting for? Your clients are waiting!
